name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】秘密結社holoX3周年 3DLIVE【#SSholoX3周年】 [ztW56LCevmI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori and Takane Lui perform the song 'Venom'.
A scripted audio drama segment featuring Hakui Koyori and Sakamata Chloe in a laboratory setting.
Sakamata Chloe and Hakui Koyori perform the song 'Luminous'.

subtitles.original: 足りないものなんだ　僕らの人生
subtitles.english: What is it we're lacking in our lives?

subtitles.original: 正解どこなんだ　探せよ探せ
subtitles.english: Where is the right answer? Search for it, search!

subtitles.original: 例外ない　二進も三進も　劣化以外ない　劣化以外ない
subtitles.english: No exceptions, stuck in a rut, nothing but degradation...

subtitles.original: 三味腐せげ　空々回れ
subtitles.english: Devouring flavor, spinning in vain.

subtitles.original: 当て処どこだ　僕らの人生
subtitles.english: Where is our destination? In our lives.

subtitles.original: 混載どこだ　隠せよ隠せ
subtitles.english: Where is the congestion? Hide it, hide it!

subtitles.original: 盛大ない　和気藹々　制裁代々　生産性ない
subtitles.english: No grand gala, no friendly harmony, sanctions for generations, no productivity.

subtitles.original: 後悔どこだ　笑えよ笑え
subtitles.english: Where is the regret? Laugh, laugh!

subtitles.original: 僕らレシピは　辛味調味　弱気ジャンキー
subtitles.english: Our recipe is spicy seasoning and a timid junkie.

subtitles.original: だんだん強がって　泥々に伏す
subtitles.english: Steadily acting tough, we fall into the mud.

subtitles.original: 毒々　飲み込んで
subtitles.english: Gulping down the poison...

subtitles.original: 苦しんで　泣いて　吐き出せない
subtitles.english: Suffering, crying, unable to spit it out.

subtitles.original: ベノベノム　さよなら
subtitles.english: Veno-venom, goodbye.

subtitles.original: 不安勢　孤独　毒　流るる
subtitles.english: Anxiety and loneliness, the poison flows.

subtitles.original: 冗態ないね　痛い痛いの飛んでけ
subtitles.english: It's not a joke, pain pain go away.

subtitles.original: 存在感　猛毒　溢るる
subtitles.english: Presence, the deadly poison overflows.

subtitles.original: 愛！　愛！　曝け出せ　ベノム
subtitles.english: Love! Love! Expose it, Venom.

subtitles.original: めっ！
subtitles.english: Bad!

subtitles.original: 最高点　どっだ　僕らの人生
subtitles.english: Where is the peak? In our lives.

subtitles.original: 満点点　どっだ　鏡よ鏡
subtitles.english: Where is the perfect score? Mirror, mirror...

subtitles.original: オンリーナイ　頂辺回って　狼狽ないの　温厚本望
subtitles.english: Only night, spinning at the top, no panic, gentle satisfaction.

subtitles.original: オーバーロード気だ　煽れよ煽れ
subtitles.english: It feels like an overload, egg it on, egg it on!

subtitles.original: 僕ら中身は　無味無味　無機ジャンキー
subtitles.english: Our inside is tasteless, inorganic junkie.

subtitles.original: どんどん強がって　バラバラに伏す
subtitles.english: Increasingly acting tough, falling apart.

subtitles.original: 毒々　飲み込んで
subtitles.english: Gulping down the poison...

subtitles.original: 苦しんで　泣いて　逃げ出せない
subtitles.english: Suffering, crying, unable to escape.

subtitles.original: ベノベノム　さよなら
subtitles.english: Veno-venom, goodbye.

subtitles.original: 不安心　孤独　毒　流るる
subtitles.english: Anxious heart and loneliness, the poison flows.

subtitles.original: 冗態ないね　痛い痛いの飛んでけ
subtitles.english: It's not a joke, pain pain go away.

subtitles.original: 存在感　既毒　毒　欲しがれる
subtitles.english: Presence, the existing poison, I can crave the poison.

subtitles.original: 愛！　愛！　曝け出せ　ベノム
subtitles.english: Love! Love! Expose it, Venom.

subtitles.original: めっ！
subtitles.english: Bad!

subtitles.original: もう圧政　孤独　毒　回るる
subtitles.english: Already tyranny, loneliness, the poison spins.

subtitles.original: 冗態ないね　痛い痛いのシクシク
subtitles.english: It's not a joke, pain pain, sobbing.

subtitles.original: 存在魔性　毒々　消えるる
subtitles.english: Demonic presence, the poison disappears.

subtitles.original: 愛！　愛！　曝け出せ　ベノム
subtitles.english: Love! Love! Expose it, Venom.

subtitles.original: 不安心　孤独　毒　流るる
subtitles.english: Anxious heart and loneliness, the poison flows.

subtitles.original: 冗態ないね　痛い痛いの飛んでけ
subtitles.english: It's not a joke, pain pain go away.

subtitles.original: 存在感　既毒　毒　欲しがれる
subtitles.english: Presence, the existing poison, I can crave the poison.

subtitles.original: 愛！　愛！　曝け出せ　ベノム
subtitles.english: Love! Love! Expose it, Venom.

subtitles.original: めっ！
subtitles.english: Bad!

subtitles.original: 曝け出せ　ベノム
subtitles.english: Expose it, Venom.

subtitles.original: めっ！
subtitles.english: Bad!

subtitles.original: 曝け出せ　ベノム
subtitles.english: Expose it, Venom.

subtitles.original: めっ！
subtitles.english: Bad!

subtitles.original: ふふっ　ふふふっ　楽しいなる！
subtitles.english: Fufu, fufufu, this is getting fun!

subtitles.original: ちょちょっと！それ何してるの！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait! What are you doing?!

subtitles.original: 何って……実験？
subtitles.english: What? ...An experiment?

subtitles.original: それぜっっっったいダメだよ！なんかめちゃくちゃ嫌な濁り方してるって！
subtitles.english: That's absolutely no good! It's turning a really nasty murky color!

subtitles.original: え？それがいいんじゃん
subtitles.english: Eh? But that's the best part.

subtitles.original: やめようよ！それ掃除するの沙花叉の仕事になるんだから！！
subtitles.english: Stop it! Cleaning that up is going to be my job!!

subtitles.original: ふふふふ……知ってる？奇跡も！魔法も！あるらしいよ！
subtitles.english: Fufufufu... You know? Miracles! And magic! They supposedly exist!

subtitles.original: もうすでにおかしくなってんじゃん！もーーー！
subtitles.english: You've already gone crazy! Geez!

subtitles.original: 伝えあった　心の温度を　そっと
subtitles.english: Softly, the warmth of the hearts we shared...

subtitles.original: 大事そうに　抱え歩いていた
subtitles.english: I walked on, holding it as if it were precious.

subtitles.original: 答えのない　願いの中で
subtitles.english: Within a wish that has no answer...

subtitles.original: 言葉は未来変えて
subtitles.english: Words will change the future.

subtitles.original: 幼い頃ずっと　夢に見ていた
subtitles.english: I had always dreamed of it as a child.

subtitles.original: 私にはまだ遠いけど　君がいれば
subtitles.english: It's still far from me, but if you're here...
